title: sri gaNapathiyE
sahitya:
shree gaNapatiyE tiruvaruL tandaruL ittadiyE

(shree)



anupallavi



aagama maRaimudalaam palakalaikat

kaadi paramporuL aagumEganE aaguvaahanE

(shree)



caraNam



ninnaruLinRi yayanum seyum vinaiyum

niRaivuRumO iDaiyooRaRumO yaan

en ninaivODu mozhitannilum tozhililum 

innal viravi iruL tunRu neRi senRu

ponRaadu munninRu

(shree)
